title: The Spirit of Exploration, with James Cameron
description:
Investigate the convergence of exploration, innovation, and imagination with Neil deGrasse Tyson and filmmaker and explorer James Cameron. Featuring comic co-host Chuck Nice and astrophysicist and StarTalk All-Stars host Charles Liu.
NOTE: StarTalk All-Access subscribers can listen to this entire episode commercial-free here: https://www.startalkradio.net/all-access/the-spirit-of-exploration-with-james-cameron/
Photo Credit: Mark Thiessen/National Geographic.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
